ygData.subject: Lets get ready
ygData.msgSnippet: Magnus sent a comm to all the allies on the council..(magmnatron...kit kat....etc.) Please. we must all meet at the council base. Time is short. Please I ask

 Magnus sent a comm to all the allies on the council..(magmnatron...kit 
kat....etc.) "Please. we must all meet at the council base. Time is short. 
Please I ask you to bring our new friends also Kit Kat. I fear that if 
divided the alliance may take advantage at a obvious foe."
